explains: n. 冲力，推力；动力，势头；动量，冲量
wordGroup: momentum transfer 动量传递；动量交换
conservation of momentum 动量守恒；动量不变原理
linear momentum 线动量；线动量陀螺仪
gain momentum 发展加快；势头增大
orbital angular momentum 轨道角动量
moment of momentum 动量矩；角动量

sentences.en: The vehicle gained momentum as the road dipped.
sentences.cn: 那辆车顺着坡越跑冲力越大。

sentences.en: The spinning top was losing momentum.
sentences.cn: 旋转的陀螺正在失去动量。

sentences.en: One kind of momentum is technological momentum.
sentences.cn: 有一种动力是技术动力。
